description:
"Brain-like" Knowledge Management Notes


The new version provides the innovative Timeline feature, where you can:
- Create Lanes and Tracks, use different periods or stages to arrange events
- Double-click to easily create a new event, which is a new card by default and stored in the card library
- Drag articles or cards to the Timeline to turn them into an event
- Dag and move events on the timeline to adjust them to the most appropriate time, and easily change the span of the timeline to get an overview
- Set different color backgrounds for Lanes and Tracks
- Drag Lanes and Tracks to adjust their positions
- Sset different colors and shapes for events to distinguish them
- Set the start and end time of events

At the same time, the new version has also greatly improved the editor response performance
